definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: It will rain, for the barometer is falling.
sentences.chinese: 天将会下雨，因为气压表正在下降。

sentences.english: When the pressure gets low the boiling-point becomes low.
sentences.chinese: 如果大气压力低，沸点就低。
气压式头部音乐按摩器。

sentences.english: Air pressure opens the gripper and a spring is used to close the gripper.
sentences.chinese: 气压打开夹持器，弹簧关闭夹持器。

sentences.english: As the vapor condenses into rain, the local atmospheric pressure drops.
sentences.chinese: 当水汽凝成雨水，会造成局域性的大气压力下降。

sentences.english: It is feasible that both exhaustion and wetting by steam fog are carried out in the chamber with low pressure.
sentences.chinese: 低气压室中既抽真空又用蒸汽雾湿润是可行的。

sentences.english: The experimental results on parameters of the pressure and the angle between pump and seed beams are then presented.
sentences.chinese: 并给出斜泵浦拉曼放大下气压和角度参量的实验结果。

sentences.english: Such instruments as (are) thermometers and barometers can be found in any physics laboratory.
sentences.chinese: 象温度计和气压计之类的仪器在任何实验室都能找到。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a single air chamber double loop pressure braking device.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型为一种单气室双回路气压制动装置。

sentences.english: Atmospheric pressure acting on the downstream side of the diaphragm forces the diaphragm and seat up.
sentences.chinese: 作用于隔膜下侧的大气压力使隔膜和阀座上升开启。

sentences.english: A simple and convenient ABS-based tire pressure measure apparatus is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于ABS的轮胎气压简便测量装置。

sentences.english: The system also brought sunny skies and high temperatures that resulted in the formation of ground-level ozone.
sentences.chinese: 高气压也引发高温和晴天，导致地面臭氧生成。

sentences.english: Fixed cistern barometers are used as a standard for checking.
sentences.chinese: 固定槽式气压计可以作为标准件去检验。

sentences.english: Can view the first round of brake oil pipe is, the adequacy of tire pressure.
sentences.chinese: 可先检视该轮制动管路是否漏油，轮胎气压是否充足。

sentences.english: No difference recognized between the engine MAP reading and the barometric (atmospheric) pressure reading at start-up.
sentences.chinese: 启动时发动机MAP读数与大气压读数无差异。

definition: millibar (mbar or mb), unit of pressure (equal to hectopascal)
